patthana15.40:4.1: Cetasikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.40:5.1: Cetasikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.40:6.1: Acetasikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naacetasiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
